summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Four Hundred Twenty-five Dollars ($425.00) out of the General Fund of The City of Seattle to pay the claim of Charles C. Herold, for personal injuries received while walking along Seventh Avenue in a southerly direction on the sidewalk on the westerly side of said Seventh Avenue between Bell Street and Blanchard Street in The City of Seattle, on the 5th day of December, 1911, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
